author: jof
title: Excellent play set
review:
This is an amazing little set for the cost (when it came out)  Most importantly, it had 3 windows & a door.

Its just big enough & has a good balance of parts so you can build many things, its not like the parts force you only to build houses....

I still have the pieces of this & instructions packed away, and I take it camping for the kids to play with.

author: Widdi
title: Another ckassic from my early childhood
review: This is a great little Basic set. Got this with 515 way back in 1992, around my 4th birthday. The set builds many different models and comes with an minifigure. You can build anything you want just with the pieces of this set. Buses, furniture, sculptures and even a boat and houses. It only lacks a proper steering wheel, but that can be easily fixed if you have some city sets from the era, too. Unfortunately It seems that I have lost my instructions for it, but I still have the pieces scattered in my collection.

author: Parkseonyang
title: Lovely set that gives a sense of nostalgia.
review:
Like I mentioned in the title, this is the first Lego system set which I own, whenever I pick it out from the cupboard, it just reminds me of my childhood as I was given this by my dad when I was around 3 or 4 years old!
I really enjoyed creating my own mini structures and having fun with it as a child. A very good set for young children playing with lego for the 1st time.
